title: How to Make Freshly Squeezed Purple Lemonade

steps.headline: Gather lemons, sugar, water, a pitcher, a juicer, and purple food coloring.
Juice about 2 cups of lemon juice and put it to the side.
Put as much water as you want in the pitcher (the more water you put in the more watery it will be).
Add the sugar.
steps.description: After you put in the water, add about 2 cups of sugar but if you want super sweet lemonade add even more!

steps.headline: Add the 2 cups of lemon juice.
Mix well until you have the taste you want.
Add  purple food coloring to make it purple.
steps.description: If you want light purple then just add 2 or 3 drops. If you want dark purple then add more.

steps.headline: Pour the delicious lemonade into a pitcher and put lots of ice in it!
steps.description: You can also put a piece of lemon in it to make it extra delicious!It's ready to serve! Enjoy!

text: Gather lemons, sugar, water, a pitcher, a juicer, and purple food coloring.  Juice about 2 cups of lemon juice and put it to the side.  Put as much water as you want in the pitcher (the more water you put in the more watery it will be).  Add the sugar. After you put in the water, add about 2 cups of sugar but if you want super sweet lemonade add even more! Add the 2 cups of lemon juice.  Mix well until you have the taste you want.  Add  purple food coloring to make it purple. If you want light purple then just add 2 or 3 drops. If you want dark purple then add more. Mix it once again!  Pour the delicious lemonade into a pitcher and put lots of ice in it! You can also put a piece of lemon in it to make it extra delicious!It's ready to serve! Enjoy! Finished.
